src.name: 最大有效月份
src.sql: select max(ny)ny from bb_data_index where bb_id='BB_SRTJ' and qybj=1

src.name: 有数据的年份
src.sql: select distinct substr(ny,1,4)nian from bb_data_index where bb_id='BB_SRTJ' and qybj=1

src.name: 有数据的月份
src.sql: select distinct substr(ny,1,4)nian,substr(ny,5,2)yue,ny from bb_data_index where bb_id='BB_SRTJ' and qybj=1 order by nian,yue

src.name: 行业分布
src.sql: select ny,hybm,hymc,bnlj,sntq, round(bnlj/sum(bnlj) over (partition by ny)*100,2) srzb,case when sntq=0 then 0 else round((bnlj-sntq)/sntq*100,2) end tbzz, r.color hycolor from ( SELECT ny, case when hd.bm in('C','K','I','O') then hd.bm else 'Z_X' end hybm, case when hd.bm in('C','K','I','O') then hd.mc else '其他行业' end hymc, sum(zse) bnlj,sum(zse_s) sntq FROM BB_SRTJ_CX r,bm_hy h,bm_hy_dl hd WHERE szbm in ('10101','10102','10103','10104','10106','10107','10109','10110','10111','10112','10113','10114','10116','10118','10119','10121') and r.hybm=h.bm and h.dlbm=hd.bm and r.lxbm=1 group by ny,case when hd.bm in('C','K','I','O') then hd.bm else 'Z_X' end,case when hd.bm in('C','K','I','O') then hd.mc else '其他行业' end ) a,czy_renders r where r.rptid='hy_tax_fb' and r.lid = a.hybm order by ny,hybm

src.name: 行业企业税收
src.description: 某行业中排名前若干名的企业的情况
